casebody.data:
RICHARDSON
v.
DEPT. OF PUBLIC INST. No. 642A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Laura E. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Public Instruction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of February 2005 by Plaintiff for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court In conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
